events.message: I placed an order last week but would like to request a refund because the product was not what I expected and I do not wish to keep it.
The system has identified the case as a refund request based on keywords mentioned in the customer's initial message.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer appropriately.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed with your request?
My order number is 12345. The product did not meet the description and I was hoping to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once you return the product using the prepaid shipping label I will send you shortly.
That sounds good to me. Please send the shipping label as soon as possible so I can return the product.
I have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the product back, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the shipping label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the product back yesterday. Thank you for your help!
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. You should see the amount back on your payment method shortly.
We have sent a short survey to gather feedback about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
The customer completed the survey and rated their experience as satisfactory and appreciated the quick resolution.
The refund case has been formally closed after successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
